name: Super Frugtopia - Platforming Tower Defense
description:
Super Frugtopia was a team project I lead for DePaul's Game Development II class.

We brainstormed ideas for a unique Tower Defense experience and came up with an active game that shatters the traditional birds-eye view in favor of a more present playstyle.

Working with the team was lots of fun.

  • Artists: David Bennett, Dana Dvorak
  • Designer: Darnesh Alleck
  • Programmers:  Luke Mayo, Matt Caputo, Christian Durtshi

This game was made in Game Maker Studio.
